pages.title: Signalum
pages.text: While made out of rare materials, Electrum gear performance isn't that great. It's a very good conductor of electricity tho. That's why it reacts so well with Redstone, forming the alloy known as Signalum (with a pinch of Aluminum for durability reasons).
No need to make a ton of it though. A single piece of Signalum can be smithed over Electrum gear to make an effective bond.
